trans-unit.source: Download the Azure SDK for PHP
trans-unit.target: Download the Azure SDK for PHP

trans-unit.source: Learn how to download and install the Azure SDK for PHP.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to download and install the Azure SDK for PHP.

trans-unit.source: Download Azure SDK für PHP
trans-unit.target: Download Azure SDK für PHP

trans-unit.source: Übersicht
trans-unit.target: Übersicht

trans-unit.source: Das Azure SDK für PHP enthält Komponenten, mit denen Sie entwickeln, bereitstellen und Verwalten von PHP-Anwendungen für Azure.
trans-unit.target: Das Azure SDK für PHP enthält Komponenten, mit denen Sie entwickeln, bereitstellen und Verwalten von PHP-Anwendungen für Azure.

trans-unit.source: Das Azure SDK für PHP umfasst insbesondere Folgendes:
trans-unit.target: Das Azure SDK für PHP umfasst insbesondere Folgendes:

trans-unit.source: Die PHP-Client-Bibliotheken für Azure.
trans-unit.target: Die PHP-Client-Bibliotheken für Azure.

trans-unit.source: Diese Klassenbibliotheken bieten eine Schnittstelle für den Zugriff auf Azure Features wie Daten-Management-Services und cloud-Dienste.
trans-unit.target: Diese Klassenbibliotheken bieten eine Schnittstelle für den Zugriff auf Azure Features wie Daten-Management-Services und cloud-Dienste.

trans-unit.source: Die azurblaue Befehlszeilenschnittstelle für Mac, Linux und Windows (himmelblau CLI).
trans-unit.target: Die azurblaue Befehlszeilenschnittstelle für Mac, Linux und Windows (himmelblau CLI).

trans-unit.source: Dies ist eine Sammlung von Befehlen für das Bereitstellen und Verwalten von Azure Services wie Azure Websites und Azure virtuelle Maschinen.
trans-unit.target: Dies ist eine Sammlung von Befehlen für das Bereitstellen und Verwalten von Azure Services wie Azure Websites und Azure virtuelle Maschinen.

trans-unit.source: Die Azure-CLI-Arbeit auf allen Plattformen, einschließlich Windows, Mac und Linux.
trans-unit.target: Die Azure-CLI-Arbeit auf allen Plattformen, einschließlich Windows, Mac und Linux.

trans-unit.source: Azurblaue PowerShell (nur Windows).
trans-unit.target: Azurblaue PowerShell (nur Windows).

trans-unit.source: Dies ist eine Sammlung von PowerShell-Cmdlets für die Bereitstellung und Verwaltung von Azure Services wie Cloud-Services und virtuelle Maschinen.
trans-unit.target: Dies ist eine Sammlung von PowerShell-Cmdlets für die Bereitstellung und Verwaltung von Azure Services wie Cloud-Services und virtuelle Maschinen.

trans-unit.source: Die azurblauen Emulatoren (nur Windows).
trans-unit.target: Die azurblauen Emulatoren (nur Windows).

trans-unit.source: Die Compute und Speicher-Emulatoren sind lokale Emulatoren für Cloud-Dienste und Daten-Management-Services, mit denen Sie eine Anwendung lokal testen.
trans-unit.target: Die Compute und Speicher-Emulatoren sind lokale Emulatoren für Cloud-Dienste und Daten-Management-Services, mit denen Sie eine Anwendung lokal testen.

trans-unit.source: Die Azure-Emulatoren laufen nur unter Windows.
trans-unit.target: Die Azure-Emulatoren laufen nur unter Windows.

trans-unit.source: In den folgenden Abschnitten wird beschrieben, wie zu die oben beschriebenen Komponenten heruntergeladen und installiert.
trans-unit.target: In den folgenden Abschnitten wird beschrieben, wie zu die oben beschriebenen Komponenten heruntergeladen und installiert.

trans-unit.source: Die Anweisungen in diesem Thema annehmen, dass Sie <link><linkText>PHP[install-php]</linkText><title></title></link> installiert.
trans-unit.target: Die Anweisungen in diesem Thema annehmen, dass Sie <link><linkText>PHP[install-php]</linkText><title></title></link> installiert.

trans-unit.source: [AZURBLAU.
trans-unit.target: [AZURBLAU.

trans-unit.source: HINWEIS]
trans-unit.target: HINWEIS]

trans-unit.source: Sie müssen PHP 5.3 oder höher, um PHP-Client-Bibliotheken für Azure zu verwenden.
trans-unit.target: Sie müssen PHP 5.3 oder höher, um PHP-Client-Bibliotheken für Azure zu verwenden.

trans-unit.source: PHP-Client-Bibliotheken für Azure
trans-unit.target: PHP-Client-Bibliotheken für Azure

trans-unit.source: The PHP Client Libraries for Azure provide an interface for accessing Azure features, such as data management services and cloud services, from any operating system.
trans-unit.target: The PHP Client Libraries for Azure provide an interface for accessing Azure features, such as data management services and cloud services, from any operating system.

trans-unit.source: These libraries can be installed via the Composer or PEAR package managers or manually.
trans-unit.target: These libraries can be installed via the Composer or PEAR package managers or manually.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to use the PHP Client Libraries for Azure, see <link><linkText>How to Use the Blob Service[blob-service]</linkText><title></title></link>, <link><linkText>How to Use the Table Service[table-service]</linkText><title></title></link> und <link><linkText>How to Use the Queue Service[queue-service]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about how to use the PHP Client Libraries for Azure, see <link><linkText>How to Use the Blob Service[blob-service]</linkText><title></title></link>, <link><linkText>How to Use the Table Service[table-service]</linkText><title></title></link> und <link><linkText>How to Use the Queue Service[queue-service]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Install via Composer
trans-unit.target: Install via Composer

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Install Git[install-git]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Install Git[install-git]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: On Windows, you will also need to add the Git executable to your PATH environment variable.
trans-unit.target: On Windows, you will also need to add the Git executable to your PATH environment variable.

trans-unit.source: Create a file named composer.json in the root of your project and add the following code to it:
trans-unit.target: Create a file named composer.json in the root of your project and add the following code to it:

trans-unit.source: Download **<link><linkText>composer.phar[composer-phar]</linkText><title></title></link>** in your project root.
trans-unit.target: Download **<link><linkText>composer.phar[composer-phar]</linkText><title></title></link>** in your project root.

trans-unit.source: Open a command prompt and execute this in your project root
trans-unit.target: Open a command prompt and execute this in your project root

trans-unit.source: Install as a PEAR package
trans-unit.target: Install as a PEAR package

trans-unit.source: To install the PHP Client Libraries for Azure as a PEAR package, follow these steps:
trans-unit.target: To install the PHP Client Libraries for Azure as a PEAR package, follow these steps:

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Install PEAR[install-pear]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Install PEAR[install-pear]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Set-up the Azure PEAR channel:
trans-unit.target: Set-up the Azure PEAR channel:

trans-unit.source: Install the PEAR package:
trans-unit.target: Install the PEAR package:

trans-unit.source: After the installation completes, you can reference class libraries from your application.
trans-unit.target: After the installation completes, you can reference class libraries from your application.

trans-unit.source: Install manually
trans-unit.target: Install manually

trans-unit.source: To download and install the PHP Client Libraries for Azure manually, follow these steps:
trans-unit.target: To download and install the PHP Client Libraries for Azure manually, follow these steps:

trans-unit.source: Download a .zip archive that contains the libraries from <link><linkText>GitHub[php-sdk-github]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Download a .zip archive that contains the libraries from <link><linkText>GitHub[php-sdk-github]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, fork the repository and clone it to your local machine.
trans-unit.target: Alternatively, fork the repository and clone it to your local machine.

trans-unit.source: (The latter option requires a GitHub account and having Git installed locally.)
trans-unit.target: (The latter option requires a GitHub account and having Git installed locally.)

trans-unit.source: The PHP Client Libraries for Azure have a dependency on the <link><linkText>HTTP_Request2</linkText><title></title></link>, <link><linkText>Mail_mime</linkText><title></title></link>, und <link><linkText>Mail_mimeDecode</linkText><title></title></link> PEAR packages.
trans-unit.target: The PHP Client Libraries for Azure have a dependency on the <link><linkText>HTTP_Request2</linkText><title></title></link>, <link><linkText>Mail_mime</linkText><title></title></link>, und <link><linkText>Mail_mimeDecode</linkText><title></title></link> PEAR packages.

trans-unit.source: The recommended way to resolve these dependencies is to install these packages using the <link><linkText>PEAR package manager</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: The recommended way to resolve these dependencies is to install these packages using the <link><linkText>PEAR package manager</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Copy the WindowsAzure directory of the downloaded archive to your application directory structure and reference classes from your application.
trans-unit.target: Copy the WindowsAzure directory of the downloaded archive to your application directory structure and reference classes from your application.

trans-unit.source: Azure PowerShell and Azure Emulators
trans-unit.target: Azure PowerShell and Azure Emulators

trans-unit.source: Azure PowerShell is a set of PowerShell cmdlets for deploying and managing Azure Services (such as Cloud Services and Virtual Machines).
trans-unit.target: Azure PowerShell is a set of PowerShell cmdlets for deploying and managing Azure Services (such as Cloud Services and Virtual Machines).

trans-unit.source: The Azure Emulators are emulators of cloud services and data management services that allow you to test an application locally.
trans-unit.target: The Azure Emulators are emulators of cloud services and data management services that allow you to test an application locally.

trans-unit.source: These components are supported Windows only.
trans-unit.target: These components are supported Windows only.

trans-unit.source: The recommended way to install Azure PowerShell and the Azure Emulators is to use the <link><linkText>Microsoft Web Platform Installer[download-wpi]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: The recommended way to install Azure PowerShell and the Azure Emulators is to use the <link><linkText>Microsoft Web Platform Installer[download-wpi]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Note that you can also choose to install other development components, such as PHP, SQL Server, the Microsoft Drivers for SQL Server for PHP, and WebMatrix.
trans-unit.target: Note that you can also choose to install other development components, such as PHP, SQL Server, the Microsoft Drivers for SQL Server for PHP, and WebMatrix.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to use Azure PowerShell, see <link><linkText>How to Use Azure PowerShell[powershell-tools]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about how to use Azure PowerShell, see <link><linkText>How to Use Azure PowerShell[powershell-tools]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Azure CLI
trans-unit.target: Azure CLI

trans-unit.source: The Azure CLI is a set of commands for deploying and managing Azure services, such as Azure Websites and Azure Virtual Machines.
trans-unit.target: The Azure CLI is a set of commands for deploying and managing Azure services, such as Azure Websites and Azure Virtual Machines.

trans-unit.source: The following list describes how to install the Azure CLI, depending on your operating system:
trans-unit.target: The following list describes how to install the Azure CLI, depending on your operating system:

trans-unit.source: Mac: Download the Azure SDK Installer here: http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=252249[mac-installer].
trans-unit.target: Mac: Download the Azure SDK Installer here: http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=252249[mac-installer].

trans-unit.source: Open the downloaded .pkg file and complete the installation steps as your are prompted.
trans-unit.target: Open the downloaded .pkg file and complete the installation steps as your are prompted.

trans-unit.source: Linux: Install the latest version of Node.js[nodejs-org] (see Install Node.js via Package Manager[install-node-linux]), then run the following command:
trans-unit.target: Linux: Install the latest version of Node.js[nodejs-org] (see Install Node.js via Package Manager[install-node-linux]), then run the following command:

trans-unit.source: You may need to run this command with elevated privileges: sudo npm install azure-cli -g
trans-unit.target: You may need to run this command with elevated privileges: sudo npm install azure-cli -g

trans-unit.source: For information about how to use the Azure CLI, see <link><linkText>How to Use the Azure Command-Line Interface for Mac, Linux, and Windows[azure cli]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about how to use the Azure CLI, see <link><linkText>How to Use the Azure Command-Line Interface for Mac, Linux, and Windows[azure cli]</linkText><title></title></link>.
